objects.text: • 16.3MP X-Trans Sensor • Advanced Autofocus • Film Simulation Modes

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Classic retro-styled compact body with durable metal construction
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M dots)
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Film Simulation modes for unique creative expression
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8.0 fps
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Intuitive dial controls for manual shooting experience
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography

banner_details:
This dynamic promotional banner features a sleek, modern design for an electronic product. The background has a dark radial gradient with geometric details and accent circles for depth and tech-inspired aesthetics. At the top, a bold and large white text layer (`tagline`) announces the nature of the promotion. Just below it, a prominent red text layer (`heading`) highlights the product name, followed by a concise, elegant white italicized tagline (`subheading`). The product image (`product_image`) is centrally placed within a dotted circular frame. To the right, a glowing red badge contains the pricing information (`price`). At the bottom, a small white text (`description`) lists product features. A bold red call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with white uppercase text (`cta`) prompts immediate interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Gradient Background: `#2C3E50`, `#1E272E`, `#0F1417`
- Accent Red: `#FF5252`, `#D32F2F`
- Text White: `#FFFFFF`
- Secondary Circle Outline: `#455A64`
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional design dominated by neutral tones. The core color palette revolves around matte black (#1C1C1C), metallic gray (#3A3A3A), and gloss black (#010101), blended subtly to convey a sense of precision and durability. Highlights on the lens and dials use white (#FFFFFF) text and indicators for sharp contrast, boosting readability. Accents like the orange around the “XF” and the gold lens markings bring a sophisticated touch with colors like orange (#FF6A00) and gold (#D4AF37). These colors work together to emphasize quality, functionality, and elegance—ideal for a tech-oriented advertisement banner.
